alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:40PM EST until January 29 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Johnson Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Oconee...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, The water level begins to flood portions of the dirt parking lot area near the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp...just upstream and rightbank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor flooding continues in the woodlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 17.6 feet and steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 14.7 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
